title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Remote Education Network Analysis: Research Capabilities Utilizing Citation Data

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science research methods and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: One can visualize the influence relationships of academic journals in the field of distance education using citation network analysis tools.
Through project-based team activities, one can identify three or more academic network patterns (e.g., centrality, clusters).
Based on analysis results, one can write a 5-page report on research trends in the field of distance education.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
